entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow. Occasional drifting snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:48 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:48 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:48 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
